attributes.action: Should students hve more choice in P.E.?
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to give students more choice in P.E. so they feel more motivated having a choice to do what they wish within the subject. They also may be able to choose a sport that they are more comfortable in so they do not get embarassed and humililated, which sadly happens too often, leading children to dislike/hate P.E.
